code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function HomePage(){const[repos,setRepos]=useState([]);const[isAuthenticated,setIsAuthenticated]=useState(false);const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleGitHubLogin=()=>{window.location.href="/oauth/github";};const handleCloneRepos=async()=>{setIsLoading(true);try{const response=await fetch("/clone-repos",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({repos})});if(response.ok){setIsLoading(false);navigate("/chat");}else{console.error("Failed to clone repositories.");setIsLoading(false);}}catch(error){console.error("Error cloning repositories:",error);setIsLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"homepage",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Welcome to the RAG Codebase App"}),!isAuthenticated?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleGitHubLogin,children:"Connect to GitHub"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleCloneRepos,disabled:isLoading,children:isLoading?"Cloning...":"Clone Repositories"})})]});}export default HomePage;
